text: Abajjuzza amagezi ag’obukugu mu mitima gyabwe okukola eby’emikono ebya buli ngeri ng’ebikolebwa abayiiya amajjolobera, oba abasala amayinja, oba abatunzi b’emidalizo n’ebimuli mu wuzi eza bbululu, n’eza kakobe n’emyufu mu bitambaala ebya linena omulungi, oba abalusi, oba abakugu abakola ebintu byonna ebya buli ngeri n’abatetenkanya amajjolobera.”
